page.title: 07Shops in Ferryhill
page.content: The main shopping centre is in and around the market place.Other small groupings occur in Dean Bank,Ferry- hill Station and the Broom.There are no shops in either Stobbs Cross or Mainsforth. In Ferryhill there are two large super markets and a number of specialised food shops such as butchers and bakers.As the largest town in the area tere are also furnishing,clothing, electrical and hardware shops. A feature of the region is the corner shop-general dealers with a localised clientele.Many of these are in danger of closure due to increased competition especially from supermarkets.
